sentence.Network_en: It was there before him, around him, everywhere , illimitable, immeasurable.
sentence.Network_cn: 它就在他的面前, 他的四周, 什么地方都是,一眼望不到头, 多得不可胜数.

sentence.Network_en: Darkness and Decay and the Red Death held illimitable dominion over all.
sentence.Network_cn: 黑暗之神、腐烂之神和红色死神以不可抗拒的力量统治一切.

sentence.Network_en: He had caught a glimpse of the apparently illimitable vistas of knowledge.
sentence.Network_cn: 那仿佛无穷无尽的知识远景在他眼前闪现了一下.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... illogical 不合逻辑的 illimitable 无限的 irrational 不合理的.

means.word_mean: 1. without limits in extent or size or quantity;

auth_sentence.content: The great dark, illimitable kingdom of death, there humanity was put to scorn.
auth_sentence.res_content: The great dark, illimitable kingdom of death, there humanity was put to scorn.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The great dark, illimitable kingdom of death, there humanity was put to scorn.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"使……,成为,进入,再"; 2. 放在同辅音词根前表示"不,无"

stems_affixes.word_buile: il不,无+legible可读的→adj.难读的,难认的
il不,无+liberal宽大的→adj.气量狭窄的,吝啬的
il不,无+licit合法的, 正当的→adj.违法的,违禁的
il不,无+literate有文化的→adj.不识字的
il不,无+logical逻辑的→adj.不合逻辑的
il使……,成为,进入,再+lus玩弄+ion表名词→被[幻觉]玩弄→幻觉
il使……,成为,进入,再+lumin光+ate表动词→使…光明→说明
il使……,成为,进入,再+lustr=lust光+ate表动词→使…光明→说明
